name: Flappy Superhero
description:
Have you ever wondered what it's like flapping like a superhero? Here's your chance to experience the life of a superhero! Flap through obstacles and avoid the pipes! Can you be #1 on the leaderboard?

Flappy Superhero is a side-scrolling platformer game where you take control of an unnamed superhero and avoid as many obstacles as you can! The game currently features 2 levels each with 3 difficulties for testing purposes, and each level has a separate leaderboard. 

I'm using Itch.io as a platform to gather feedback and suggestions on whether it is worth pursing development of this game, which is currently a project for fun, and to determine if it would be worth publishing on the mobile app stores. Please provide any feedback you have in my Discord server: https://discord.gg/kB5GWuQtTk

Currently only an Android APK build is available as I have no way of distributing it on Apple devices at this point in time.
